title: on me by section 1(2) of the Air Navigation and Transport Act 2022 (No. 40 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Transport by section 
1(2) of the Air Navigation and Transport Act 2022 (No. 40 of 2022), this Order 
appoints 22nd December 2022 as the day on which certain provisions of that 
Act come into operation.
